titles.title: 734 I'm Dead To Sin Through Christ (familiar easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm dead to sin
Through Christ my Lord
For in His death
I also died
It's written clear
In God's own Word
And praise His name
I'm justified

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm dead to sin
Thus I must live
To Christ alone
Who gave His all
And for His love
I can't but give
My life and gifts
Both great and small

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm dead to sin
So I must serve
My God and King
Each day and hour
What He commands
I must observe
And seek to do
With heav'nly pow'r

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'm dead to sin
O blessed thought
I now can rest from
Care and strife
My fight He has
Forever fought
And now I live
His risen life
